Smooth, Bump-Free Shaves - Made Simple. The Bevel Electric Shave Essentials Kit is a 3-step system built for all hair types, with specialized performance for coarse and curly hair, taking the guess work out of your grooming routine.

USUALLY SHIPS IN 1 BUSINESS DAY

30 DAY MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE

 

What’s Inside:

  • Bevel Electric Shaver: Dermatologist-tested for a clean, close shave without irritation.

  • Clear Shave Gel: Lightweight, transparent formula with aloe vera + cucumber for skin nourishment and precision.

  • Post Shave Bump Control: Hydrating balm that soothes skin and helps prevent razor bumps.

Why You'll Love It:

    • Designed for All Hair Types: Delivers exceptional results, especially for coarse and curly hair.

    • Delivers a Smooth, Irritation-Free Finish: Helps prevent razor burn and bumps.

    • Simple, Three-Step Routine: Consistently great results with minimal effort.

 

Complete Your Routine!
